FILE: cm220666v11.0.txt
DYAD: ISRAEL-FRANCE

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180213
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180213

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4542 

TERRMID: MID4542 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4542 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID4542 from Gibler (2018), Israeli troops seized a French consul after he tried to re-enter Israel from Gaza. Coded not territory because no boundary was being disputed.

TERRLINK: MID4542 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4542 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4542 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4542 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4542 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4542 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4542 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4542 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4542 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4542 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4542 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4542 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4542 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4542 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4542
rivalry=220666 nationa=ISRAEL nationb=FRANCE MID4542 20090128-20090128 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Israeli troops fired at and detained the French consul to Jerusalem as he was trying to re-enter Israel from Gaza. First day of dispute was on 1/28/2009 and last day of dispute was on 1/28/2009.

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
